title: This ground floor 3bed has all you could ask for and more!
posting_body: ['The Meadows of Coon Rapids Apartments offers 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes for rent in Coon Rapids, MN.', 'Many of our apartment homes here at the Meadows offer great amenities like an attached garage, a full-size washer and dryer, and central air/heat.', 'The Meadows of Coon Rapids Apartments is in a wonderful neighborhood with quiet streets.', 'Enjoy a community-centered neighborhood close to many local businesses and dining.', 'Our community is just blocks from Highway 10 and Highway 47, two miles from the Coon Rapids Riverdale Station & Platform, and only 20 minutes from Minneapolis.', 'We offer pet-friendly apartment living for those looking to live a life of comfort with their furry friends.', 'Come visit us today and make The Meadows your choice for apartment living in Coon Rapids!', '-Basketball Court', '-On-Site Management', '-Clubhouse', '-Hub automated package receiving', '-Controlled Entry', '-Garage', '-Dishwasher', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', '-Washer/Dryer', '-Patio/Balcony', '-Carpeting', '-Playground', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Monday-Friday: 9AM-6PM', '1770 121st Ave NW, Coon Rapids, MN 55448', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Specials are based on availability and may expire or change at any time.', 'Specials and discounts may not be combined.', 'Rates are subject to change without advance notice.']
